entry.title: hexo/next/github.io
entry.content: 记录下hexo/next/github.io的构建，避免硬盘or电脑崩了后，重建hexo/next/github.io的成本。 Hexo1234567891011#安装hexo v3.7.1npm install -g hexo-cli#创建hexo站mkdir hexo && hexo init && npm install#设置站点相关属性vim _config.yml#其它配置看情况更改#hexo常用命令hexo cleanhexo ghexo s NexT主题12345678910111213141516#下载主题 tag 切换到 NexT.Pisces v6.3.0cd hexogit clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/next#创建分类/检签/关于hexo new page categorieshexo new page tagshexo new page about#修改source/[categories/tags/about]/index.md中的type为[categories/tags/about]#添加搜索功能npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save# 搜索站点_config.xml添加 并在主题_config.xml中将Local search，将enable设置为truesearch: path: search.xml field: post format: html limit: 10000 github.io12345#安装部署插件npm install hexo-deployer-git --save#部署命令hexo cleanhexo d -g
